item.description:
Win the Trophy by joining us in our first Grill-Off!

The rules? Iron Chef standards...You can find the rules under more/files on the meetup site

The Judges: After Eleven and Queen Obvious

There will be a combination of charcoal and gas grills available; right now we are at 7 but if you'd like to donate a grill to the cause let me know.

What should you grill? Anything you want! (legal consumables only please)

We know a few of our favorite grill buddies might be fasting that day but just come late and join in at the level you feel comfortable! There aren't any rules about cooking!

All the standard stuff applies - cook onsite, bring what you want to drink and some to share, there are no rules, expect to have a fabulous time.

Bonus extra prize (there will be prizes, this is a bonus one) I will give an award for the best "grilling outfit" as voted on by the attendees.
item.name: The Great Big Over-the-Top First Annual Summertime Grill-Off Invitational
